title: Riot please unban me
body: Riot please unban me I put a lot of time and some money into my main account and I am very sorry for flaming my team and if you could please unban my main account I would promise on the cross that I would completely reform and I wouldn't be toxic at all in any way shape or form please Riot I really enjoyed playing with my friends and now I can't and it would really make my day if you would unban me and just give me 1 chance to change please Riot im begging you.

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.
Ask Tyler1 and he still being Toxic.
Oh he got accounts unbanned? When? Didnt hear about that.
That the reason,  He made another account lol.

"Give me 1 chance to change" 

Boi they gave you all the chances BEFORE they banned you. If you got banned for a long time/permanently, they gave you more than one chance, and you just kept abusing it. It only matters to you now because you lost your account.
you chose to act the same with AFTER you were hit with a 14 day ban, Unless Riot has screwed up again, you won't be unbanned.

> [{quoted}](name=BoomDoom215,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=JP1fAVLx,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-04-16T18:23:46.255+0000)
